title: Text measurement support
body: To draw text layout properly one needs [SkPaint::breakText](https://people.mozilla.org/~bgirard/doxygen/gfx/classSkPaint.html#a2f67d6bc4440396adb50af367ee08b85) and [SkPaint::measureText](https://people.mozilla.org/~bgirard/doxygen/gfx/classSkPaint.html#a4892a1b1fd671acc9d99b5ccd8ff92d8)
